actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States must require recipients of aid to families with dependent children to participate in community work experience programs if they are able to do so.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require (presently, permit) a State to establish a community work experience program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States must require recipients of aid to families with dependent children to participate in community work experience programs if they are able to do so.
